problem_text_cn: 已知圆锥的底面半径为5cm,设圆锥的母线与高的夹角为θ(如图所示),且sinθ的值为\frac{5}{13},则侧面积为()
problem_text_en: Given that the radius of the bottom surface of the cone is N_0, the angle between the generatrix of the cone and the height is θ (as shown in the figure), and the value of sinθ is \frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the lateral area is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵sinθ的值为\frac{5}{13},圆锥的底面半径为5cm,∴母线长为13cm．∴圆锥的侧面积=\frac{1}{2}•L•R=\frac{1}{2}×10π×13=65πcm²．故选:C．
